actions.Name: Keen Edge
actions.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 300.

actions.Name: No Mercy
actions.Description:
Increases damage dealt by 20%.
Duration: 20s
Additional Effect: Grants Ready to Break
Duration: 30s

actions.Name: Brutal Shell
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 240.
Combo Action: Keen Edge
Combo Potency: 380
Combo Bonus: Restores own HP
Cure Potency: 200
Combo Bonus: Creates a barrier which nullifies damage equaling HP restored
Duration: 30s

actions.Name: Camouflage
actions.Description:
Increases parry rate by 50% while reducing damage taken by 10%.
Duration: 20s

actions.Name: Demon Slice
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Increased enmity

actions.Name: Royal Guard
actions.Description:
Significantly increases enmity generation.
Effect ends upon reuse.

actions.Name: Lightning Shot
actions.Description:
Delivers a ranged attack with a potency of 150.
Additional Effect: Increased enmity

actions.Name: Danger Zone
actions.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 250.

actions.Name: Solid Barrel
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 240.
Combo Action: Brutal Shell
Combo Potency: 460
Combo Bonus: Adds a Cartridge to your Powder Gauge

actions.Name: Gnashing Fang
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 500.
Additional Effect: Grants Ready to Rip
Duration: 10s
Effect of Ready to Rip ends upon execution of any weaponskill.
Cartridge Cost: 1
This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

actions.Name: Nebula
actions.Description:
Reduces damage taken by 30%.
Duration: 15s

actions.Name: Demon Slaughter
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 100 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Increased enmity
Combo Action: Demon Slice
Combo Potency: 160
Combo Bonus: Adds a Cartridge to your Powder Gauge

actions.Name: Aurora
actions.Description:
Grants Regen to target.
Cure Potency: 300
Duration: 18s
Maximum Charges: 2

actions.Name: Superbolide
actions.Description:
Reduces HP by 50% of maximum and renders you impervious to most attacks.
Duration: 10s

actions.Name: Sonic Break
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 300.
Additional Effect: Damage over time
Potency: 60
Duration: 30s
Can only be executed when Ready to Break.

actions.Name: Continuation
actions.Description:
Allows the firing of successive rounds with your gunblade.
Gnashing Fang may be followed by Jugular Rip.
Savage Claw may be followed by Abdomen Tear.
Wicked Talon may be followed by Eye Gouge.
Burst Strike may be followed by Hypervelocity.
Fated Circle may be followed by Fated Brand.

actions.Name: Bow Shock
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 150 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Damage over time
Potency: 60
Duration: 15s

actions.Name: Heart of Light
actions.Description:
Reduces physical damage taken by 5% and magic damage taken by 10% for self and nearby party members.
Duration: 15s

actions.Name: Heart of Stone
actions.Description:
Reduces damage taken by a party member or self by 15%.
Duration: 7s
Additional Effect: When targeting a party member while under the effect of Brutal Shell, that effect is also granted to the target
Duration: 30s

actions.Name: Burst Strike
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 460.
Additional Effect: Grants Ready to Blast
Duration: 10s
Effect of Ready to Blast ends upon execution of any weaponskill.
Cartridge Cost: 1

actions.Name: Fated Circle
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 300 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Grants Ready to Raze
Duration: 10s
Effect of Ready to Raze ends upon execution of any weaponskill.
Cartridge Cost: 1

actions.Name: Bloodfest
actions.Description:
Draws aetheric energy from target, adding 3 Cartridges to your Powder Gauge.
Additional Effect: Grants Ready to Reign
Duration: 30s

actions.Name: Blasting Zone
actions.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 800.

actions.Name: Heart of Corundum
actions.Description:
Reduces damage taken by target party member or self by 15%.
Duration: 8s
Additional Effect: When targeting a party member while under the effect of Brutal Shell, that effect is also granted to the target
Duration: 30s
Additional Effect: Grants Clarity of Corundum to target
Clarity of Corundum Effect: Reduces damage taken by 15%
Duration: 4s
Additional Effect: Grants Catharsis of Corundum to target
Catharsis of Corundum Effect: Restores HP when HP falls below 50% or upon effect duration expiration
Cure Potency: 900
Duration: 20s

actions.Name: Double Down
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack to all nearby enemies with a potency of 1,200 for the first enemy, and 15% less for all remaining enemies.
Cartridge Cost: 1
This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

actions.Name: Trajectory
actions.Description:
Rush to a targeted enemy's location.
Additional Effect: Increased enmity
Maximum Charges: 2
Cannot be executed while bound.

actions.Name: Great Nebula
actions.Description:
Reduces damage taken by 40%.
Additional Effect: Increases maximum HP by 20% and restores the amount increased.
Duration: 15s

actions.Name: Reign of Beasts
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 800 for the first enemy, and 60% less for all remaining enemies.
Can only be executed when Ready to Reign.

roleActions.Name: Rampart
roleActions.Description:
Reduces damage taken by 20%.
Additional Effect: Increases HP recovery via healing actions on self by 15%
Duration: 20s

roleActions.Name: Provoke
roleActions.Description: Gesture threateningly, placing yourself at the top of a target's enmity list while gaining additional enmity.

roleActions.Name: Reprisal
roleActions.Description:
Reduces damage dealt by nearby enemies by 10%.
Duration: 15s

roleActions.Name: Shirk
roleActions.Description: Diverts 25% of enmity to target party member.

roleActions.Name: Interject
roleActions.Description: Interrupts the use of a target's action.

roleActions.Name: Arm's Length
roleActions.Description:
Nullifies most knockback and draw-in effects.
Duration: 6s
Additional Effect: When you are struck by a physical attack, the striker will be afflicted with Slow +20%
Duration: 15s

actions.Name: Gnashing Fang
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 7,000.
Additional Effect: Grants Ready to Rip
Duration: 10s

※Continuation changes to Jugular Rip while under the effect of Ready to Rip.

actions.Name: Continuation
actions.Description:
Allows the firing of successive rounds with your gunblade.
Gnashing Fang may be followed by Jugular Rip.
Savage Claw may be followed by Abdomen Tear.
Wicked Talon may be followed by Eye Gouge.
Burst Strike may be followed by Hypervelocity.
Fated Circle may be followed by Fated Brand.

actions.Name: Rough Divide
actions.Description:
Rushes target and delivers an attack with a potency of 2,000.
Additional Effect: Grants No Mercy
No Mercy Effect: Increases damage dealt and healing potency by 10%, while also increasing movement speed by 25%
Duration: 7s
Maximum Charges: 2
Cannot be executed while bound.

actions.Name: Blasting Zone
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 5,000.
Potency increases up to 10,000 as the target's HP decreases, reaching its maximum value when the target has 50% HP or less.

actions.Name: Relentless Rush
actions.Description:
Unleashes a flurry of blade strikes on nearby enemies, dealing damage over time with a potency of 4,000 and reducing damage taken by 25% until effect expires.
Duration: 4s
Activates Terminal Trigger when effect duration expires.
Additional Effect: Afflicts target with Relentless Shrapnel, increasing target's damage taken by 5%
Duration: 6s
Maximum Stacks: 5
Can be executed while moving.
Can only be executed when the limit gauge is full.
Gauge Charge Time: 60s

※Action changes to Terminal Trigger upon execution.

actions.Name: Heart of Corundum
actions.Description:
Grants self or target party member the effect of Heart of Corundum and Catharsis of Corundum.
Heart of Corundum Effect: Reduces damage taken by 10%
Duration: 10s
Catharsis of Corundum Effect: Restores HP when HP falls below 50% or upon effect duration expiration
Cure Potency: 12,000
Duration: 10s

actions.Name: Fated Circle
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Grants Nebula
Duration: 10s
Nebula Effect: Counters all incoming attacks.
Counter Potency: 4,000
Additional Effect: Grants Ready to Raze
Duration: 10s
This weaponskill does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

※Continuation changes to Fated Brand while under the effect of Ready to Raze.

actions.Name: Keen Edge
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 5,000.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Brutal Shell
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 6,000.
Combo Action: Keen Edge

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Solid Barrel
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 7,000.
Combo Action: Brutal Shell

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Burst Strike
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000.
Combo Action: Solid Barrel
Additional Effect: Grants Ready to Blast
Duration: 10s

※Continuation changes to Hypervelocity while under the effect of Ready to Blast.
※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Savage Claw
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 8,000.
Combo Action: Gnashing Fang
Additional Effect: Grants Ready to Tear
Duration: 10s

※Continuation changes to Abdomen Tear while under the effect of Ready to Tear.
※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Wicked Talon
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 9,000.
Combo Action: Savage Claw
Additional Effect: Grants Ready to Gouge
Duration: 10s

※Continuation changes to Eye Gouge while under the effect of Ready to Gouge.
※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Hypervelocity
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000.
Additional Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 8,000 potency
Duration: 6s
Can only be executed when Ready to Blast.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Jugular Rip
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000.
Additional Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 6,000 potency
Duration: 6s
Can only be executed when Ready to Rip.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Abdomen Tear
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000.
Additional Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 6,000 potency
Duration: 6s
Can only be executed when Ready to Tear.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Eye Gouge
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000.
Additional Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 6,000 potency
Duration: 6s
Can only be executed when Ready to Gouge.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Terminal Trigger
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 12,000 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Stun
Duration: 3s
Can only be executed while under the effect of Relentless Rush.
Relentless Rush effect expires upon execution.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

actions.Name: Fated Brand
actions.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 4,000 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Heavy +75%
Duration: 4s
Additional Effect: Creates a barrier around self that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 8,000 potency
Duration: 6s
Can only be executed while under the effect of Ready to Raze.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.

roleActions.Name: Guard
roleActions.Description:
Reduces damage taken by 90% and grants immunity to Stun, Heavy, Bind, Silence, Half-asleep, Sleep, Deep Freeze, and knockback and draw-in effects.
Duration: 5s
Movement speed is reduced by 50% for the duration of this effect.
Effect ends upon reuse, using another action, or when the effect duration expires.

roleActions.Name: Standard-issue Elixir
roleActions.Description:
Restores your HP and MP to maximum.
Casting will be interrupted when damage is taken.

roleActions.Name: Purify
roleActions.Description:
Removes Stun, Heavy, Bind, Silence, Deep Freeze, and Miracle of Nature.
Additional Effect: Grants Resilience
Resilience Effect: Nullifies status afflictions that can be removed by Purify, as well as knockback and draw-in effects
Duration: 3s
Can be used even when under the effect of certain status afflictions.

roleActions.Name: Sprint
roleActions.Description:
Increases movement speed by 50%.
Effect ends upon reuse or execution of another action.
